data.title: Prime Minister of Israel: Menachem Begin
data.meta_description: In May 1977, Menachem Begin was elected as the sixth prime minister of Israel. It was considered a political upheaval, as Begin was the first politician from the right-wing Likud to win since 1948. After forming a large and stable government comprised mainly of...
